update sw_store set creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ys_result = #{ysResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_no = #{tranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_object_id = #{bizObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workflow_instance = #{workflowInstance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_commit = #{endCommit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_address = #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_pic = #{storePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, store_goods_num = #{storeGoodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_goods_sku_num = #{storeGoodsSkuNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_admin = #{storeAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT se.store_name as storename, se.store_address as storeaddress, se.store_pic as storepic, se.store_goods_num as storegoodsnum, se.store_goods_sku_num as storegoodsskunum, se.store_admin as storeadmin, se.id as meetingId FROM `sw_store` se WHERE se.is_enabled = 1 AND se.deleted = 0 AND se.end_commit = 1 order by store_goods_sku_num desc

SELECT se.store_name as storename, se.store_address as storeaddress, se.store_goods_num as storegoodsnum, se.store_goods_sku_num as storegoodsskunum, se.store_admin as storeadmin, se.id as id FROM `sw_store` se WHERE se.id = #{meetingId}
mapper.update: update `sw_store` se set se.store_name =#{storename}, se.store_address =#{ storeaddress}, se.store_goods_num =#{ storegoodsnum}, se.store_goods_sku_num =#{ storegoodsskunum}, se.store_admin =#{ storeadmin} where se.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT se.store_name as storename, se.store_address as storeaddress, se.store_pic as storepic, se.store_goods_num as storegoodsnum, se.store_goods_sku_num as storegoodsskunum, se.store_admin as storeadmin FROM `sw_store` se WHERE se.store_name =#{storename} AND (se.create_time between #{createtime} and #{updatetime} OR se.update_time between #{createtime} and #{updatetime} )
